Ahead of him, built precariously onto an overhanging ledge was a great nest from which a huge golden eagle had just departed. I wonder what that is, thought the hungry wolf.

Caleb put his paws on the nest's rim and peeked over the edge. Four large white eggs lay in a bed of soft feathers, each egg the size of a baseball. The curious wolf looked up and around, making sure the eagle was gone, before he quickly pulled the rest of his body over the edge and hopped inside. Mmm, I haven't had eggs in a while, Caleb thought licking his lips, before opening his maw wide and biting down on one.

His teeth met the strong shell but the shell did not break. Well this isn't good, the wolf thought, rather miffed. Once again he tried to bite a different egg open but the shell was too tough for even his mighty teeth. But the wolf was determined and thought, I'm gonna eat you, one way or another!

124.content:
Caleb is the king of this forest.

Everyone knew it. Even the mightiest predators know to stay out of his way, and parents scare their cubs with stories of his gruesome feats. Occasionally, some brave young warrior would rise up and try to challenge him; they would always end up gurgling away in his belly before they could even lay a paw on him. This is mostly because Caleb was born with a condition that makes him preternaturally tall for a gray wolf; at around 5 feet tall, he’s as big as most grizzly bears. His condition also made him quite stretchy, in all the right places...

Surprisingly enough for a king, Caleb didn’t really have a mate — well, that’s not entirely true. He’s probably mated with every female in the forest at least once, but he never really considered any of them worthy of being his ‘official’ mate. Indeed, being the king, whenever he was feeling a little hot and bothered, he could just empty his balls into any gal he wanted. They knew what the consequences of disobeying him would be, after all. He always swallowed up the males of the forest without hesitation; but the females, if they ‘performed’ well, he liked to keep around, and would even protect.

His big, furry balls swelled with cum, after having gurgled up a mouse into jizz earlier. He licked his lips, a devious grin on his face as he searched for an attractive female to ‘blow off some steam’ with. He already knew where the dens of quite a few animals were hidden; all he had to do was decide which gal he would be visiting today.

He could have some fun with a much smaller female, like a rabbit or a raccoon. They were always so incredibly tight, and the feeling of power he had over them was intoxicating. Then again, he could also visit some regular sized animals, like a wolf or a fox. There were a few she-wolves around here he wouldn’t mind knocking up with a litter of his cubs. Finally, he could pick on somebody his own size, like a bear or a doe. Dominating the largest and most powerful animals in the forest was always a fun challenge, though slightly risky.
